# RSA convert exponent modulus to regular private key format

```
#!/usr/bin/env python

from Crypto.PublicKey import RSA
e = int('65537', 16)
n = int('', 16)
# Construct a `RSAobj` with only ( n, e ), thus with only PublicKey
print( RSA.construct( ( n, e ) ).publickey().exportKey().decode('utf8') )

```
